did.unittitle: Frail World War II Memorial Collection
did.abstract: This collection of news clippings and photographs were gathered together by Edward Frail to memorialize soldiers who were killed in World War II.

accessrestrict.p: Items in this collection may be subject to Copyright Laws.

bioghist.p: The young men memorialized in this collection were members of the Armed Services who were killed during World War II. Frail researched newspapers for information and photographs of the men and personally photographed their tombstones when possible. Included in each memorial is an explanation of the military events surrounding their deaths.

scopecontent.p:
Originally housed in a self-sticking page scrapbook, each page has been photocopied to preserve its original presentation and the contents of the page removed and foldered with the photocopied page.
